title: Nanozymes as a tool to boost agricultural production: from preparation to application
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00780H, Critical Review
Kan Huang, Chengxiao Hu, Qiling Tan, Songwei Wu, Sergey Shabala, Min Yu, Xuecheng Sun
Nanozymes, as an emerging class of biomimetic enzymes, not only inherit the unique properties of nanomaterials but also endow them with catalytic functions that are similar to biological enzymes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
